description:
jChecklist is a check list application allowing you to put order in your life and not forget important tasks. jChecklist can be used for grocery lists, travel checklists, to-do lists, etc. You can create multiple lists and you have the ability to hide checked off items. Add items to the list can be done very easily and quickly using the 'add items' input box, where you can insert several different text items in succession and click "Add" when done. There is an option to delete checked items, as well as automatically create a new list for items checked in the currently displayed list. List items can also be reordered easily by tap-n-hold and dragging them in the list. You can display the checked count and total number of items for each list. Can cut/copy/paste items from one list into another list. Long text will now word-wrap around on multiple lines in a list. Can import list data from a text file in the media partition storage (USB Drive). Standard WebOS filtering control added so you can filter out what is displayed in the main list. Many speed up improvements added. There is also an option to have a 'home page' showing a list of all your lists which you can go to by simply tapping on a list item. A backup feature is also available to backup your entire database via an email system. Thus, making backup and restore of your data a breeze. An excellent application for those who need checklists in their lives.
New Features: Can email individual lists. Added the ability to define the order of the lists displayed on the home page. Can backup & restore database to the Cloud using your own web server.
